ValidationRule.description: Prevents EDRD users from creating an inappropriate Provider-Allied Staff relationship when the Account and Contact record types are specific and roles as Allied Staff and based ProviderType field as well.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "EDRD"), INCLUDES(Roles, 'Allied Staff'), OR( Account.RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Provider', Contact.Account.RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Provider', NOT(ISPICKVAL(Account.Provider_Type__pc, 'Physician')), NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL(Contact.Account.Provider_Type__pc, 'Nurse'), ISPICKVAL(Contact.Account.Provider_Type__pc, 'Pharmacist'), ISPICKVAL(Contact.Account.Provider_Type__pc, 'Nurse Practitioner') ) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: An EDRD user can only create a relationship with the Allied Staff role, where the account is a Physician and the contact is either a Nurse or a Pharmacist.
